content:
Early Stage Research Position available within the framework of the NL4XAI: Interactive Natural Language Technology for Explainable Artificial Intelligence Innovative Training Network, a project funded by the European Union’s Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme under the Marie Skłodowska-Curie Grant Agreement No. 860621.

  • Project description: NL4XAI- ESR4: Explaining logical formulas, hosted by Utrecht Univ., The Netherlands.
  • Deadline for applications: June 4, 2021, at 23h59 CEST
  • General eligibility criteria, required documents, evaluation criteria, and further information: NL4XAI Website
sender_full_name: Alberto Bugarín (CiTIUS - University of Santiago de Compostela, ES)
